Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Just thought I'd join up as I seem hooked on KSP currently and the community seems real friendly. ;D I've thought about having a pop at modding myself but think it might be a bit out of my league.

Welcome to the Kerbal Space Program forums! It doesn't matter what your skill level is at modding, now's your chance to climing the rungs . You'll find the community very receptive. If you need any help with modding, we're here! Have fun .
